title: What are some movies that include the song 'We're Not Gonna Take It'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some movies or trailers “We’re Not Gonna Take It” has been used in. The song was used in the commercials for the 2006 movie Charlotte's Web. It was also used in 1986 Ron Howard movie Gung Ho. It was also used in the 2001 movie featuring Chris Kattan as "Corky Romano". The song was used in two TV spots of the 2015 film, The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water. The song is featured in the classic 2001 Disney motion picture Max Keeble's Big Move. The song was also used in the teaser trailer of the 2016 film, Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life, and it's also featured in the 2018 science fiction film Ready Player One. You can find out more about the song, including what television episodes, commercials, and political campaigns have used it, by going here: We're Not Gonna Take It (Twisted Sister song) - Wikipedia
